downloadDescription: The toolkit contains wizard-based utilities for creating new activities and custom integration packs for System Center 2022 (or above) Orchestrator. The “Microsoft .NET Framework” Integration Pack is also included with the toolkit.
detailsSection:
Changelog:
v10.22.1.2 (25.04.2022)
  • Upgraded all binaries to 64-bit architecture. The toolkit can still be used to make 32-bit .NET based activities and Integration Packs.
  • No functional change in comparison to previous release.

v10.22.3.1 (17.08.2022)
  • Fix IPWizard runtime errors
  • Orchestrator SDK assemblies target .NET Framework 4.0 (AnyCPU arch) allowing broader .NET Fx compatibility
  • Include x86 MSMs to allow generation of x86 Integration Packs for SCO 2019 and older

v10.22.3.4 (22.08.2022)
  • Updated .NET Framework Integration Pack’s version
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating System
  • Windows Server 2012 or above

    • Recommended Configuration for System Center Orchestrator Integration Toolkit
  • RAM – minimum 1GB, recommended 2GB
  • Disk space minimum -- 200MB
  • CPU -- Dual Core or better
installInstructionSection: System Center Orchestrator should be installed prior to installing the included “.NET Framework” Integration Pack.
